initialTour.title: Welcome to our platform!
initialTour.content: Before you begin, please note that the data here is provided in raw format. To filter by categories such as region or time period, you'll need to process it using external tools like Excel, BigQuery, Python, or R. Don't worry! We have tutorials to help you.

lastTour.title: Congratulations, you've completed the tour!
lastTour.content: You now know how to explore the platform's main features. If you need help at any time, our team is available.
